Class People

  • java.lang.Object
    • People
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public class People
extends java.lang.Object
    People Class New Changes: Minor adjustment to constructors (Bank) Last Changes Made: Brought Back receivedMoney() Version 1.03

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double dMoney 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      People(java.lang.String strName)
      This constructor creates a People object that is assumed to be a player (due to the lack of isBank identifier)
      People(java.lang.String strName, boolean isBank, int nPlayers)
      This constructor creates a People object that can either be a Player or a bank

    • Constructor Detail

      • People

        public People(java.lang.String strName)
        This constructor creates a People object that is assumed to be a player (due to the lack of isBank identifier)
        Parameters:
        strName - name of the Player

      • People

        public People(java.lang.String strName,
              boolean isBank,
              int nPlayers)
        This constructor creates a People object that can either be a Player or a bank
        Parameters:
        strName - name of the Player
        isBank - identifies if it is a bank or a Player
        nPlayers - number of players in the game for the bank to initialize cash
